General.Name: BIDV Insurance Corp
General.Description: Bank for Investment and Development of Vietnam Insurance Joint Stock Corporation provides general insurance, reinsurance, loss survey, and investment services to individual and corporate customers in Vietnam and internationally. It offers accident, worker's compensation, and health insurance; travel insurance; automobile and motorbike insurance; and theft and burglary insurance products. The company also provides ATM, fire and special perils, business interruption, property all risks, and compulsory fire and explosion insurance products; civil engineering completed risks, machinery breakdown, boiler and pressure vessels, contractors' plant and machinery, contractors' all risk/erection all risk, and electronic equipment insurance; and specific cargos, air cargo, inland transit, and marine cargo insurance products. In addition, it offers ship builder risk, crew, and marine hull insurance; ship-owners civil liabilities, and public and product liability insurance; aviation insurance; and surety bond and money insurance products. Further, the company is involved in receiving and ceding reinsurance related to various classes of non-life insurance; trading in stocks and bonds, and participating in joint stock companies and other financial investments; and loss prevention, loss surveys, real estate trading, and lending activities. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.
